import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import matplotlib.style as style
%matplotlib inline

style.use('fivethirtyeight')
pandemic=euro_to_dollar.copy()[euro_to_dollar['Time'].dt.year>=2020]

fig,ax=plt.subplots(figsize=(10,10))
ax.plot(euro_to_dollar['Time'],euro_to_dollar['rolling_mean'],color='#ADD8E6')
ax.plot(pandemic['Time'],pandemic['rolling_mean'],color='#EE4B2B')
ax.set_xlabel('Year')
ax.set_ylabel('Rolling Mean of the Euro to the Dollar')
ax.set_title('Evaluating the Reaction of the Euro to the Dollar Since the Pandemic (2020)')

plt.show()
